level.heading: Purpose; emission and air control standards; air pollution control program; administration of subchapter.
Cross References
level.text: Acid rain, research and plan, see 42 U.S.C. § 8901 et seq.
Air pollution prevention and control, Clean Air Act, see 42 U.S.C. § 7401 et seq.
Clean Air Act, see 42 U.S.C. § 7401 et seq.
Pollution Prevention Act of 1990, see 42 U.S.C. § 13101 et seq.
Stratospheric Ozone Protection, see 42 U.S.C. § 7671 et seq.
Sulfur dioxide, acid deposition control, air pollution prevention and control, see 42 U.S.C. § 7651 et seq.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-165
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-165, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-101.04.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to DC Law 6-100, the "Litter Control Administration Act of 1985;" DC Law 6-42, the "Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs Civil Infractions Act of 1985;" DC Law 5-165, the "DC Air Pollution Control Act of 1984;" DC Law 13-172, the "Rodent Control Act of 2000;" and DC Law 6-126, the "Construction Codes Approval and Amendments Act of 1986", see Mayor's Order 2002-5, February 1, 2002 (49 DCR 911).
